trans-unit.source: Exercise – Split and Combine Production Orders

seg-source.mrk: Exercise – Split and Combine Production Orders

trans-unit.source: Create a sales order to customer 10000 (delivery date: February 2, 2019) with the following lines:

seg-source.mrk: Create a sales order to customer 10000 (delivery date: February 2, 2019) with the following lines:

trans-unit.source: Item: P-10502, Quantity: 15

seg-source.mrk: Item: P-10502, Quantity: 15

trans-unit.source: Item: P-10502, Quantity: 12

seg-source.mrk: Item: P-10502, Quantity: 12

trans-unit.source: Create two new production orders from the Sales Order. Open the Planning Pool page and select and combine the two production orders for item P-10502. Open the Sequence Planning page and split the production order as follows:

seg-source.mrk: Create two new production orders from the Sales Order.
Open the Planning Pool page and select and combine the two production orders for item P-10502.
Open the Sequence Planning page and split the production order as follows:

trans-unit.source: Machine M023, Quantity 17

seg-source.mrk: Machine M023, Quantity 17

trans-unit.source: Machine M022, Quantity 10

seg-source.mrk: Machine M022, Quantity 10

trans-unit.source: Create a Sales Order and Production Orders

seg-source.mrk: Create a Sales Order and Production Orders

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to create the sales order and production orders:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to create the sales order and production orders:

trans-unit.source: In the navigation pane, under Manufacturing, click Planning > Sales Orders.

seg-source.mrk: In the navigation pane, under Manufacturing, click Planning > Sales Orders.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click New.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click New.

trans-unit.source: Press ENTER or TAB to insert a new number.

seg-source.mrk: Press ENTER or TAB to insert a new number.

trans-unit.source: In the Customer field, enter 10000.

seg-source.mrk: In the Customer field, enter 10000.

trans-unit.source: In the Requested Delivery Date field, enter 02/02/19.

seg-source.mrk: In the Requested Delivery Date field, enter 02/02/19.

trans-unit.source: On the Lines FastTab, in the Type field, enter Item.

seg-source.mrk: On the Lines FastTab, in the Type field, enter Item.

trans-unit.source: In the No. field, enter P-10502.

seg-source.mrk: In the No.
field, enter P-10502.

trans-unit.source: In the Quantity field, type 15.

seg-source.mrk: In the Quantity field, type 15.

trans-unit.source: On the next line, in the No. field, enter P-10502.

seg-source.mrk: On the next line, in the No.
field, enter P-10502.

trans-unit.source: In the Quantity field, type 12.

seg-source.mrk: In the Quantity field, type 12.

trans-unit.source: Select both lines.

seg-source.mrk: Select both lines.

trans-unit.source: On the Lines FastTab, click Order > Create Prod. Order.

seg-source.mrk: On the Lines FastTab, click Order > Create Prod.
Order.

trans-unit.source: Select the Show Production Orders check box and then click Yes to create the production orders.

seg-source.mrk: Select the Show Production Orders check box and then click Yes to create the production orders.

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the message stating that two production orders were created.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the message stating that two production orders were created.

trans-unit.source: In the Production Order List page, click Navigate > Card.

seg-source.mrk: In the Production Order List page, click Navigate > Card.

trans-unit.source: On the Lines FastTab, click Functions > Order Tracking to verify the link to the sales order.

seg-source.mrk: On the Lines FastTab, click Functions > Order Tracking to verify the link to the sales order.

trans-unit.source: Escape back to the Production Order List page and repeat steps 15-16 for the second line.

seg-source.mrk: Escape back to the Production Order List page and repeat steps 15-16 for the second line.

trans-unit.source: Escape back to the Sales Order.

seg-source.mrk: Escape back to the Sales Order.

trans-unit.source: On each sales order line, click Line > Functions > Order Tracking to verify the link to the production orders.

seg-source.mrk: On each sales order line, click Line > Functions > Order Tracking to verify the link to the production orders.

trans-unit.source: Close the Sales Order.

seg-source.mrk: Close the Sales Order.

trans-unit.source: Combine Production Orders

seg-source.mrk: Combine Production Orders

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to combine the production orders:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to combine the production orders:

trans-unit.source: In the navigation pane, under Manufacturing, click Planning > Planning Pool.

seg-source.mrk: In the navigation pane, under Manufacturing, click Planning > Planning Pool.

trans-unit.source: In the General section, enter P-10502 in the Item Filter field to locate the production orders you created for item P-10502.

seg-source.mrk: In the General section, enter P-10502 in the Item Filter field to locate the production orders you created for item P-10502.

trans-unit.source: Select both lines.

seg-source.mrk: Select both lines.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Actions > Combine Prod. Order Line.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click <span class="Bold">Actions > Combine Prod.
Order Line.

trans-unit.source: Click Yes to combine the selected production orders.

seg-source.mrk: Click Yes to combine the selected production orders.

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the message that a new production order was created.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the message that a new production order was created.

trans-unit.source: With the new production order line selected, click Navigate > Prod. Order.

seg-source.mrk: With the new production order line selected, click <span class="Bold">Navigate > Prod.
Order.

trans-unit.source: On the Lines FastTab, click Functions > Order Tracking to verify the link to the originating sales order.

seg-source.mrk: On the Lines FastTab, click Functions > Order Tracking to verify the link to the originating sales order.

trans-unit.source: Escape back to the Planning Pool page and then click OK to close it.

seg-source.mrk: Escape back to the Planning Pool page and then click OK to close it.

trans-unit.source: Split Production Order

seg-source.mrk: Split Production Order

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to split the production order:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to split the production order:

trans-unit.source: On the Planning menu, click Sequence Planning.

seg-source.mrk: On the Planning menu, click Sequence Planning.

trans-unit.source: In the General section, select the line for work center M023.

seg-source.mrk: In the General section, select the line for work center M023.

trans-unit.source: Locate and select the production order you created during the combining process.

seg-source.mrk: Locate and select the production order you created during the combining process.

trans-unit.source: On the Lines FastTab, click Functions > Split Prod. Order Line.

seg-source.mrk: On the Lines FastTab, click Functions > Split Prod.
Order Line.

trans-unit.source: On the first line, for work center M023, type 17 in the Quantity field.

seg-source.mrk: On the first line, for work center M023, type 17 in the Quantity field.

trans-unit.source: On the next line, in the Work Center No. field, enter M022.

seg-source.mrk: On the next line, in the Work Center No.
field, enter M022.

trans-unit.source: Ensure that the Quantity field is set to 10.

seg-source.mrk: Ensure that the Quantity field is set to 10.

trans-unit.source: Click OK.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK.

trans-unit.source: Select the production order line, click Line > Prod. Order on the Lines FastTab.

seg-source.mrk: Select the production order line, click <span class="Bold">Line > Prod.
Order on the Lines FastTab.

trans-unit.source: On the Lines FastTab, click Functions > Order Tracking to verify the link to the originating sales order.

seg-source.mrk: On the Lines FastTab, click Functions > Order Tracking to verify the link to the originating sales order.

trans-unit.source: Escape back to the Sequence Planning page.

seg-source.mrk: Escape back to the Sequence Planning page.

trans-unit.source: In the General section, select the line for work center M022.

seg-source.mrk: In the General section, select the line for work center M022.

trans-unit.source: Locate and select the new production order for 10 units of item P-10502.

seg-source.mrk: Locate and select the new production order for 10 units of item P-10502.

trans-unit.source: Repeat steps 9-11 to confirm the link to the originating sales order.

seg-source.mrk: Repeat steps 9-11 to confirm the link to the originating sales order.

trans-unit.source: Close the Sequence Planning page.

seg-source.mrk: Close the Sequence Planning page.
